name: No More Snow
description:
Introducing “No More Snow”, the thrilling top-down shooter game where Santa Claus must fight against Krampus and his mischievous minions! With cartoonish low poly graphics, “No More Snow” takes players on an adventure through 10 unique levels, including the snowy mountains, a spooky graveyard, and Santa’s very own workshop.



In “No More Snow”, players will have access to a wide variety of weapons, including rifles, shotguns, and even a flamethrower. Don’t forget about the powerful melee weapons, such as a trusty axe and a deadly candy cane. With these tools at your disposal, take on an army of monsters, including snowmen, zombies, and even evil elves.



But beware, as you journey through the game, you’ll face off against 8 challenging boss fights, including the grim reaper, the snowman king, and of course, Krampus himself. Will you be able to save Christmas from the clutches of evil and bring peace to the North Pole? Play “No More Snow” and find out!
